form.label: Alert Actions
form.description: This page includes results of alert actions run by this plugin and a view into internal logs of Splunk to debug those actions

search.query: `puppet_actions_index` sourcetype="puppet:action" | eval strf_time=strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d %T %:z") | rename strf_time as "Time" | table Time host action_name action_state joburl message

panel.title: Splunk modalert generate detailed report logs

search.query: index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd component=sendmodalert action="generate_detailed_report" | eval strf_time=strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d %T %:z") | rename strf_time as "Time" | rename event_message as "Event" | table Time splunk_server Event

panel.title: Splunk modalert Tasks (investigate, act, etc) logs

search.query: index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd component=sendmodalert (action="puppet_run_task_investigate" OR action="puppet_run_task" OR action="puppet_run_task_act") | eval strf_time=strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d %T %:z") | rename strf_time as "Time" | rename event_message as "Event" | rename action as Action | table Time Action splunk_server Event
